description:
Tensions run high when a slave-owning Celestial Dragon washes up on Fish-Man Island. His former captives cry for out for blood, but Queen Otohime sees it as a chance to mend fences between the gilled and non-gilled!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: L`île des Hommes-Poissons ébranlée. Le dragon céleste naufragé
Shaking Fish-Man Island! A Celestial Dragon Drifts In!
Суматоха на Острове Рыболюдей! Кораблекрушение Теньрьюбито!
ارتجاج جزيرة البرمائيّين! تنّين سماويّ مجروف!
揺れる魚人島! 漂着した天竜人
